items.title: Found Footage Horror ‘Project Butterfly: Flatwoods’ Coming Halloween Night 2025!
bullets: • Project Butterfly: Flatwoods is a found footage horror film set during the lunar eclipse of 2004, in Flatwoods, West Virginia

• The further the students dig, the more they uncover the terrifying truths of this bunker

items.title: September, typical boom month for shipping, looks more like freight recession this year
bullets: • The Logistics Managers' Index shows the lowest reading it has ever recorded for transportation utilization in September
• The index is a combination of eight key metrics in the logistics supply chain covering warehousing, transportation, and inventory
• Professor Dale Rogers says the underlying data corresponds to a declining rate of growth for future freight logistics orders
